user.title: TIS Home Automation Setup
user.description: Set up your TIS Home Automation integration to control TIS smart home devices.

communication.title: Communication Type
communication.description:
Choose how to communicate with your TIS devices.

**UDP Network**: Communicate over your local network (Port 6000)
**RS485 Serial**: Connect directly via serial port

data_description.communication_type: UDP network communication is recommended for most setups

udp_config.title: UDP Network Configuration
udp_config.description:
Configure network settings for UDP communication.

**Local IP**: Your Home Assistant server IP address
**Port**: TIS protocol port (default: 6000)

data_description.local_ip: IP address of this Home Assistant instance

serial_config.title: RS485 Serial Configuration
serial_config.description:
Configure serial port settings for RS485 communication.

**Serial Port**: The RS485 adapter port
**Baud Rate**: Communication speed (default: 9600)

discovery.title: Device Discovery
discovery.description:
Discover TIS devices on your network or RS485 bus.

**Discovery Timeout**: How long to wait for device responses

Communication: **{communication_type}**
Connection: **{communication_details}**

data_description.discovery_timeout: Time to wait for device discovery responses
